name: com.huynguyen03dev.ide.kiro
description: Unity IDE integration for Amazon Kiro - Seamless Unity development with Kiro's agentic AI coding environment. Includes IntelliSense support, project generation, and debugging tools for Unity developers using Kiro IDE.

_upm.changelog:
Integration:

- Add support for Amazon Kiro IDE
- Migrated from Cursor IDE to Kiro IDE integration
- Enhanced agentic development workflow support
